entry.data:
CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
WINDY AND MUCH COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
